name: SnakeBot
description: What is the project about? SnakeBot is an utility token for Telegram Bot. User needs to hold 20M (0.2% of total supply) in order to use Telegram Bot that sends unique alerts (sniper alert, whale alert, more coming soon) about ERC-20 tokens. What makes your project unique? Community of 1200+ people and private community of 285+ people. Great alerts that provide useful information for traders. History of your project. Created on August 2 SnakeBot quickly gained popularity among traders. In this short period of time, we have gathered a large and friendly community that helps each other to trade on DEX and profit from bot alerts. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are working on adding one new type of alert (alpha alert) and Base network. What can your token be used for? In order to use Telegram Bot user need to hold 20M (0.2% of total supply) tokens.
